name: The Piano
description: Accused of his brothers' murders, failed pianist John Barnerway searches for answers on the streets of post-war Paris. Part traditional survival horror, part noir-influenced murder mystery, The Piano is an unsettling and riveting indie adventure.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 Processor: 2.8GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: nVidia GeForce 8600/9600GT or equivalent DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 7 GB available space Additional Notes: Currently compatible with 64 bit operating systems only, pending a patch in 1-2 weeks.
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
